oval-def:metadata.oval-def:title: Remote Code Execution in ImageMagick in GitHub Enterprise (May 04, 2016)
oval-def:metadata.oval-def:description: Several vulnerabilities in ImageMagick, a package commonly used by web services to process images, have been discovered and disclosed by members of the Mail.ru Security team. One of the vulnerabilities is critical and can lead to remote code execution when processing user submitted images.

oval-def:criterion.comment: Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.6.0 and less than 2.6.1
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.5.0 and less than 2.5.6
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.4.0 and less than 2.4.9
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.3.0 and less than 2.3.13
Check if the version of GitHub Enterprise is greater than or equal 2.2.0 and less than 2.2.19
